fullText: Connor and Zegler are both appealing performers with good chemistry, and they bring a youthful energy to the roles that feels authentic.

bwwExcerpt: Gold’s in-the-round staging makes dynamic use of side areas, including the aisles and the catwalk above the stage, but the environment it creates is hermetic. There’s little sense of a Verona beyond this Instagrammable party space—or of its rules. And ultimately, I think, that undermines the play; i...
